dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT q.quote_xid FROM quote q INNER JOIN order_release orel ON q.quote_gid = orel.quote_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON orel.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid WHERE jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) quote_number, j.job_xid job_number, (CASE WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN 'TSFE' || j.job_xid ELSE sref1.shipment_refnum_value END) hbl_number, j.attribute5 mbl_number, sr.shipment_refnum_value booking_number, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(cv.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central','MM/DD/YYYY') booking_date, (CASE WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN j.attribute13 ELSE sref1.shipment_refnum_value END) ams_number, (CASE WHEN cvref1.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL THEN (SELECT loc.location_name FROM location loc INNER JOIN quote q ON loc.location_gid = q.origin_location_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON q.quote_gid = orel.quote_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON orel.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid WHERE jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) ELSE cvref1.charter_voyage_refnum_value END) load_port, (CASE WHEN cvref2.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL THEN (SELECT loc.location_name FROM location loc INNER JOIN quote q ON loc.location_gid = q.destination_location_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON q.quote_gid = orel.quote_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON orel.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid WHERE jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) ELSE (CASE WHEN l4.location_name IS NULL THEN cvref2.charter_voyage_refnum_value ELSE l4.location_name END) END) discharge_port, l1.location_name booking_till, (CASE WHEN l2.location_name IS NULL THEN cvref3.charter_voyage_refnum_value ELSE l2.location_name END) last_transhipment_port, (SELECT loc.location_name FROM location loc INNER JOIN quote q ON loc.location_gid = q.destination_location_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON q.quote_gid = orel.quote_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON orel.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid WHERE jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) final_delivery_place, l3.location_name shipping_line, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_name, TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990') containers, (SELECT (CASE WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 19 THEN 'LCL' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 20 THEN '20''' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 21 THEN '20''RF' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 40 THEN '40''' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 41 THEN '40''HCRF' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 42 THEN '40''HC' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 45 THEN '45''' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 46 THEN '45''RF' END) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) container_type, (SELECT LISTAGG(ssu.tag_3,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1) container_numbers, (SELECT DISTINCT sc.payment_method_code_gid FROM job_order_release_join jorjoin INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vshipor ON jorjoin.order_release_gid = vshipor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON vshipor.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON ship.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid AND sc.cost_type = 'B' WHERE jorjoin.job_gid = j.job_gid) freight_terms, (CASE WHEN (SELECT LISTAGG(ssu.tag_4,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1) IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR((SELECT a.m_date FROM (SELECT ssd.shipment_gid, TO_DATE(ssu.tag_4,'MM/DD/YYYY') m_date, MAX(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_4,'MM/DD/YYYY')) over (partition by ssu.tag_4) max_date FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND NOT ssu.tag_4 IS NULL) a WHERE a.m_date = a.max_date AND a.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),'MM/DD/YYYY') END) gate_in_date, (CASE WHEN sref2.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN sref3.shipment_refnum_value ELSE sref2.shipment_refnum_value END) vessel_voyage, (CASE WHEN cv.actual_departure_date IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(cv.departure_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') END) ELSE (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(cv.actual_departure_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.actual_departure_date,cv.source_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') END) END) etd_origin, (CASE WHEN cv.actual_arrival_date IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(cv.arrival_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(cv.actual_arrival_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') END) eta_first_pod, (CASE WHEN cv.actual_departure_date IS NULL THEN '' ELSE (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(cv.actual_departure_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.actual_departure_date,cv.source_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') END) END) actual_sail_date, (CASE WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DD' THEN 'Door-to-Door' WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DP' THEN 'Door-to-Pier' WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PD' THEN 'Pier-to-Door' WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PP' THEN 'Pier-to-Pier' WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RP' THEN 'Rail-to-Pier' WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RD' THEN 'Rail-to-Door' WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RR' THEN 'Rail-to-Rail' WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PR' THEN 'Pier-to-Rail' WHEN cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DR' THEN 'Door-to-Rail' ELSE cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_value END) move_type, (SELECT LISTAGG(ssu.tag_1,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1) agent_seal_number, (SELECT LISTAGG(ssuref.refnum_value,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2' WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1) custom_seal_number, (CASE WHEN sref4.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN sref5.shipment_refnum_value ELSE sref4.shipment_refnum_value || ', ' || sref5.shipment_refnum_value END) shipping_bill_number FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid --AND -- vsor.shipment_gid IN ( -- SELECT sh.shipment_gid -- FROM shipment sh -- WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid -- AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' -- AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' -- AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' -- AND sh.perspective = 'B') INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid AND loc1.country_code3_gid = 'IND' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvref1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvref1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvref1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_LOCATION_ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvref2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvref2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvref2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvref3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvref3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvref3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvref4 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvref4.charter_voyage_gid AND cvref4.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_MOVE_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON cv.dest_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON 'SCOULAR.' || cvref3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l3 ON s.servprov_gid = l3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l4 ON 'SCOULAR.' || cvref2.charter_voyage_refnum_value = l4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL NUMBER OVERRIDE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.BOOKING_VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER BILL NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref5 ON s.shipment_gid = sref5.shipment_gid AND sref5.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER BILL DATE' WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND j.user_defined1_icon_gid = 'SHIP_CARR' AND (TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:INS_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:INS_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY j.job_xid
